column4: 1.788#TD4044E.TXT.r#389718#389722#TD4044E.TXT.r_1459;TD4044E.TXT.r_1460;TD4044E.TXT.r_1461;TD4044E.TXT.r_1462# gang gi don du mkhyen ce na / / +de la sogs pa'i dbang du byas pa ni / / +zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa des zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389746#389756#TD4044E.TXT.r_1465# mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa bral ba'i 'bras bu dang  tshogs yongs su smin pa'i skyes bu'i byed pa'i 'bras bu dang  bdag dang gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'i bdag po'i 'bras bu dang  'di ltar ma 'ongs pa  ni 'bras bu sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis po rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o // /

column3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' yi gnas gyur pa // / +de dag la ni mgo bos bdag phyag 'tshal // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389767#389782#TD4044E.TXT.r_1466;TD4044E.TXT.r_1467;TD4044E.TXT.r_1468;TD4044E.TXT.r_1469;TD4044E.TXT.r_1470;TD4044E.TXT.r_1471# sbyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna yang spong ngo zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i 'bras bu'o // / +bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi tshogs su gyur pa yang yin la zhes bya ba ni / /

column3: blo zhan rnams kyis ma legs bshad pa yi // / +mun pas thub pa'i gsung ni khebs pa la // /
gang gi sgron mas gsal bar mdzad pa yi // / +sgron ma mdzad  pa de la phyag 'tshal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389783#389790#TD4044E.TXT.r_1470;TD4044E.TXT.r_1471;TD4044E.TXT.r_1472# de yi skyes bu byed las byung // / +zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so // / +bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dbang gi 'bras bu'o // /

column3: la la dag ni thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab mtha' dag gi don dang  tshig gzung ba'i skal ba yod pa'i ngang tshul can dge ba dag yin du zin kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389791#389803#TD4044E.TXT.r_1472;TD4044E.TXT.r_1473;TD4044E.TXT.r_1474# bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dbang gi 'bras bu'o // / +pha rol du yang gang dang gang du skyes par  phyug pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954151#1954154#TD4032E.TXT.r_5308;TD4032E.TXT.r_5309;TD4032E.TXT.r_5310;TD4032E.TXT.r_5311# de bas na shes rab kyis yang dag pa'i gdams ngag byin pas rnam par grol bar byed do // / +thabs la mkhas pa'i  pha rol tu phyin pas ni / / +byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pas / /
column6: 0.019#TD4032E.TXT.r#1953335#1953336#TD4032E.TXT.r_5203;TD4032E.TXT.r_5204# nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su lus rnam pa thams cad du rgyun chad pas rgyun chad par 'gyur ro // / +yang na byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo bas sbyin pa la sogs pa mi zad par 'gyur  te ; /
column7: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166701#1166706#TD4047E.TXT.r_6691;TD4047E.TXT.r_6692;TD4047E.TXT.r_6693# rkyen bzlog pa'i sbyin pa dgag pa'i phyir / / +dbul por 'gyur du dogs pa'i 'jigs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2267157#2267160#TD4010E.TXT.r_4796;TD4010E.TXT.r_4797;TD4010E.TXT.r_4798;TD4010E.TXT.r_4799# mchog rab kyi yon tan yang mchog rab nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +sa bdag 'khor los sgyur bar de 'gyur te // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column9: 0.023#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205118#2205118#TD4046E.TXT.r_1239;TD4046E.TXT.r_1240;TD4046E.TXT.r_1241# yun ring po dang rgyun mi 'chad  pa'i dus nas zhugs pas na goms pa'o // / +bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su zin pas na thabs dang ldan pa'o // / +rigs la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa phul du phyin pa'i rtags kun du spyod pa'i gnas skabs kyi'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1178881#1178882#TD4047E.TXT.r_8327;TD4047E.TXT.r_8328;TD4047E.TXT.r_8329# yun ring po dang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dus nas  zhugs pa na goms pa'o // / +bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su zin pas na thabs dang ldan pa'o // / +rigs la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtags kun du spyod pa'i gnas skabs kyi'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4027E.TXT.r#559032#559034#TD4027E.TXT.r_1213;TD4027E.TXT.r_1214# shes rab kyis ni yang dag pa'i gdams ngag byin pas rnam par grol bar byed do // / +thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pas sbyin pa la sogs pa mi zad par byed do // /
column12: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335313#1335313#TD4037E.TXT.r_2677;TD4037E.TXT.r_2678# zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul por 'gyur du dogs pa'i 'jigs pas sbyin pa sbyin par yang mi byed do // /
column13: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1164976#1164977#TD4047E.TXT.r_6447# ci dga' dgur byed du 'jug pas zhes bya ba ni sbyin par byed pa la sogs pa dbang du gyur pa'i sbyor bas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin  dga' dgur byed pa nyid do // /
column14: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2617395#2617395#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10085;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10086# gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa'o // / +mu bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur la 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yang yod / /
column15: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#280695#280695#TD4026E.TXT.r_996;TD4026E.TXT.r_997# dngos po med pa ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi     // / +'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166604#1166604#TD4047E.TXT.r_6677;TD4047E.TXT.r_6678# da ltar ni lta ba ngan pas yongs su gzung ba'i sbyin pa 'gog par byed pa yin pas zlos pa'i skyon na yod par thal bar mi 'gyur ro // / +'tshe ba'i sbyin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: 'phral gyi bya ba la thogs pas ma thob pa'i nyams pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang  shes rab zhan pa  la la dag chos mngon pa klags pa'i thos pa tsam gyis skrag par 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389804#389815#TD4044E.TXT.r_1473;TD4044E.TXT.r_1474;TD4044E.TXT.r_1475;TD4044E.TXT.r_1476;TD4044E.TXT.r_1477# pha rol du yang gang dang gang du skyes par  phyug pa dang zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PA ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +sbyin pa la yang mos par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni / / +rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389816#389828#TD4044E.TXT.r_1476;TD4044E.TXT.r_1477;TD4044E.TXT.r_1478;TD4044E.TXT.r_1479;TD4044E.TXT.r_1480# de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa'i chos gzhan dag la yang ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o // / +tshig dang rtog pa ni tshig gi rtog pa    ste ; /

column3: de dag rtag tu khong du chud par 'dod pa yang yod de / / +de bas na de dag dga' bar bya ba'i phyir / /
bdag gis chos mngon pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa 'di brtsam mo // / +'di ltar bde bar gshegs pa rnams  kyi dngos po brgyad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389829#389840#TD4044E.TXT.r_1479;TD4044E.TXT.r_1480;TD4044E.TXT.r_1481;TD4044E.TXT.r_1482# yang na tshig kun nas slong bar byed pa'i rtog pa ni tshig gi rtog pa ste / / +tshig gi rtog pa can gyi mtshan nyid kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 'dod pa'i khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu rtog pa'i rtog pa'o // /

column3: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang  'du byed rnams dang  rnam par shes pa dang  nam mkha' dang  so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang  so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389839#389858#TD4044E.TXT.r_1480;TD4044E.TXT.r_1481;TD4044E.TXT.r_1482;TD4044E.TXT.r_1483# tshig gi rtog pa can gyi mtshan nyid kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 'dod pa'i khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu rtog pa'i rtog pa'o // / +bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni dga' ba'o // /

column3: de la gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las  gyur pa'i gzugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623473#1623483#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4812# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711468#1711473#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1794# bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te / /
column6: 1.192#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1912487#1912487#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3600# de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te / /
column7: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#162514#162514#TD4035E.TXT.r_6572# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye  mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te / /
column8: 1.788#TD4036E.TXT.r#17562#17565#TD4036E.TXT.r_2548;TD4036E.TXT.r_2549# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column9: 1.788#TD4036E.TXT.r#24156#24160#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column10: 1.788#TD4036E.TXT.r#24788#24791#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774;TD4036E.TXT.r_3775# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column11: 1.788#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093707#3093707#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column12: 1.788#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3114474#3114478#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3285# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang   gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'o // /

column15: 1.788#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308378#2308379#TD4049E.TXT.r_3544# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ji lta bar    rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste / /

column26: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1741049#1741051#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5455# rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang  rtags de dang  mtshan ma de yid la mi byed kyi / /
column27: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392638#2392638#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9693# bstan bcos rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column28: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392666#2392667#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9695# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de mtha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column29: 0.016#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128150#2128150#TD4029E.TXT.r_1052# zad par gyi skye mched ni zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag go // /
column30: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920058#920060#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3765;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# bzang po'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas gnas te rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /
column31: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920173#920173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3785# thams cad skye mched bcu ni sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar  po ste kha dog bzhi dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis kyis bsnan te bcu'o // /
column32: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901491#2901491#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4719# gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam  shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang gsum gyi sems can gyi rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po la rten to // /
column33: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702190#2702190#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /
column34: 0.016#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760272#2760273#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // / +mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched la rags par yid la byed cing bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste / /
column35: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#993899#993902#TD4054E.TXT.r_417# gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched shes pa'o // /
column36: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024647#1024648#TD4054E.TXT.r_5578# 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye    mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de / /
column37: 0.016#TD4068E.TXT.r#571716#571721#TD4068E.TXT.r_103# gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i  skye mched na ni rnam par shes pa 'du shes la brten pas de'i 'og tu 'du shes kyi phung po bstan to // /
column38: 0.016#TD4068E.TXT.r#589811#589811#TD4068E.TXT.r_2366# gzugs med pa na  skye mched bzhi la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med cung zad med min skye mched las 'phags pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa des cung zad med pa'i skye mched man chad kyi nyon mongs pa dang 'dod    chags kun spangs pa na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o // /
column39: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#697711#697711#TD4091E.TXT.r_489# zad par gyi skye mched las ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi rnams ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin  yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched gnyis kyis so // /
column40: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416463#1416465#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1873# dgu pa dang bcu pa zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ni 'og nas 'chad par     // /
column41: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706758#1706759#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1197# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skya mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do zhes bka' stsal to // /
column42: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1415263#1415270#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1745;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1746# 'du shes kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs med pa gsum ste nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni nam mkha'i 'du shes kyis rab tu phye ba yin no // /
column43: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128035#2128037#TD4029E.TXT.r_1036;TD4029E.TXT.r_1037# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o // / +rnam  shes mtha' yas skye mched ni lnga pa'o // /
column44: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1042140#1042142#TD4054E.TXT.r_8154# zad par sa dang  zad par chu dang  zad par med  dang  zad par rlung dang  zad par sngon po dang  zad par ser po dang  zad par dmar po dang  zad par dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column45: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1825146#1825146#TD4039E.TXT.r_1249# de la 'du shes gcig dang ldan pa ni gzugs med pa dag gi nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis so // /
column46: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078735#1078735#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4410# zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlu rlung dang  sngon po dang ser po dang  dmar po dang dkar  po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column47: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786350#786350#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3251;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3252# zad par gyi skye mched bcu las / / +zad par nam mkha' dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag gis te / /
column48: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#104224#104224#TD4095E.TXT.r_8091# zad par sa dang chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /
column49: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712942#2712942#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1407# tshad med pa'i 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na spyod pa'i'o // /
column50: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#178548#178549#TD4035E.TXT.r_9397# 'dod pa chung du rnams la 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i spros  pa'i 'ching ba dang  gzugs chen por gyur pa rnams la 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i spros pa'i 'ching ba dang  nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched tshad med pa la 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i spros pa'i 'ching ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched la / /
column51: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876712#1876713#TD4039E.TXT.r_7184# sna tshogs kyi 'du shes kyi gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched mi gyo ba'o // /
column52: 0.024#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965662#2965662#TD4053E.TXT.r_142# tshad med pa ni nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ste / /

column54: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876728#1876728#TD4039E.TXT.r_7185;TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa rnams la ni gong nas gong du gyo ba spangs pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya'o // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /
column55: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352986#2352987#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4895;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4896# snying rje'i mtha' ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +dga' ba ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o // /
column56: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353204#2353205#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4914# dga' ba ni bde ba'i rnam pa 'byed pa lta bur 'jug pa'i phyir dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni  rang gi rnam par shes pa mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir dang  mtha' med pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu 'phel ba dang bde bar gyur pa'i phyir dga' ba bsgoms pa'i mtha' ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi bar du'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: 'byung ba dag ni bzhi ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams so // / +khams dag ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan 'dzin pa dang  rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#155941#155943#TD4035E.TXT.r_5385# 'du shes tshad med pa'i lha rnams dang  ci yang med par 'du shes pa rnams dang  'du shes med 'du shes  med min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389858#389872#TD4044E.TXT.r_1483;TD4044E.TXT.r_1484# gzugs kyi 'du shes dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nam mkha'i 'du shes dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes dang  ci  yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i 'du shes so // /
column6: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041276#1041277#TD4054E.TXT.r_8016# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i gnas ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column7: 0.015#TD4091E.TXT.r#753312#753315#TD4091E.TXT.r_10559;TD4091E.TXT.r_10560# 'du shes dman pa'i phyir 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ste / /

column9: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1074776#1074776#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3699# 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de / /
column10: 0.017#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2635956#2635956#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12496# de bas na de skad du yongs su 'dri bas brgal bas ni 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir    'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos pas de nyid bshad do // /
column11: 0.017#TD4095E.TXT.r#102411#102411#TD4095E.TXT.r_7689# 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303198#2303202#TD4049E.TXT.r_2710;TD4049E.TXT.r_2711# chos shes pa dang  rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i phyogs dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes  kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid de / /
column13: 0.018#TD4053E.TXT.r#2984072#2984073#TD4053E.TXT.r_2640;TD4053E.TXT.r_2641# bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i skye mchod kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal bas 'phags pa'i lam mchog tu gsal ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyir    gcig tu 'jig rten par rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#1025574#1025575#TD4054E.TXT.r_5720;TD4054E.TXT.r_5721# ci yang med pa'i skye  mched kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid do // /
column15: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1868659#1868659#TD4039E.TXT.r_6232# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes cha phra ba'i phyir srid pa'i nang na zhi ba 'di dag ni mchog yin no snyam pas mos pa ni  mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column16: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#827750#827750#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10162# de bzhin du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ma bskyed par 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du mi nus so // /
column17: 0.018#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1912487#1912487#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3600# de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te / /
column18: 0.020#TD4039E.TXT.r#1843720#1843721#TD4039E.TXT.r_3480# de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi 'du shes spangs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shes dang   rnam par shes pa dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'du shes yid la byed do // /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392737#2392739#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9703# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni shin tu phra ba'i dmigs pa'i rnam par rig pas shin tu phra bas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column20: 0.021#TD4067E.TXT.r#1089422#1089423#TD4067E.TXT.r_453# mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes ni tha snyad la mi mkhas pa dang  mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa'o // /
column21: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392713#2392715#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9701# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya bas ni sems bdun pa ston te / /

column23: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1378192#1378192#TD4037E.TXT.r_8224# rkyen 'di pa nyid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  khams rab tu dbye ba dang  dbugs dbyung ba dang  rngub pa dran pa dang  bsam gtan dang po nas rgyas par 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  byang chub sems dpa'i bsam  gtan dang  mngon par shes pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i bar du yid la byed pa na yang / /
column24: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095229#3095229#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_464;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_465# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan / /
column25: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876986#1876986#TD4039E.TXT.r_7220;TD4039E.TXT.r_7221# de bas na shes pa snga ma ni brten pa yin la phyi ma ni rten du gyur bar blta bar bya'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni zag pa med pa'i lam med de / /
column26: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2974253#2974254#TD4053E.TXT.r_1308# 'du shes med  'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column27: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1008270#1008272#TD4054E.TXT.r_2887;TD4054E.TXT.r_2888;TD4054E.TXT.r_2889# 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column28: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786366#786368#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3253# nam mkha' dang  rnam par shes pa dang  ci yang med pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dag ni rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir phung po bzhi'i rang  bzhin te / /
column29: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876303#1876306#TD4039E.TXT.r_7138# de la 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa spang par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa na mthar gyis mi gyo bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba dang   'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba'i lam gsum la brten nas mi gyo ba dang  ci yang med pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column30: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076118#2076118#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14191# rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched yin te 'du shes med pa lta bur de gnas so // /
column31: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826257#826257#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9930;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9931# de yid la byed pa gang la sngon du 'gro ba yod pa de ni nges par 'byin pa'i 'du shes sngon du  btang ba'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba 'phen par byed pa'i las ni thams cad pas mchog yin pa'i phyir ram / /
column32: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#57251#57251#TD4036E.TXT.r_8519# nam mkha' dang  rnam  shes dang  ci yang med dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen por bsgoms na yang nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye ste / /
column33: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#197187#197187#TD4035E.TXT.r_12648# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched thob pa'o // /
column34: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#194115#194115#TD4035E.TXT.r_12124# bdag ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min du mi 'gyur ro  zhes bya ba'i bar du mi gyo'o // /
column35: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1481749#1481749#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9541;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9542# de'i lam de nyid skye mched yin no // / +de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa dang ci yang med do snyam du de dag gi rnam par byed pa'i phyir / /
column36: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#57233#57233#TD4036E.TXT.r_8519# nam mkha' dang  rnam  shes dang  ci yang med dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen por bsgoms na yang nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye ste / /

column3: de dag gi rang bzhin ni sra ba dang gsher ba dang tsha ba dang gyo ba nyid dag go // / +las ni rten pa dang sbyor ba dang smin par byed pa dang bskyod pa dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#22998#22999#TD4036E.TXT.r_3508;TD4036E.TXT.r_3509# gang zag phyir mi 'od ba bsam    gtan dang por skyes pa ni de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar des na shi 'phos nas gong nas gong du 'og min gyi bar gyi lhar 'gro ba'am // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi skye ba'i gnas mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389871#389883#TD4044E.TXT.r_1483;TD4044E.TXT.r_1484;TD4044E.TXT.r_1485# gzugs kyi 'du shes dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nam mkha'i 'du shes dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes dang  ci  yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i 'du shes so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i lhar skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rnam par dag pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862356#2862357#TD4052E.TXT.r_2397# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched na ni 'du shes zhan pa'i  phyir rang gi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam med da / /
column7: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076173#2076174#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14199# de la zhes bya ba ni 'du shes  med 'du shes med min skye mched la ste / /
column8: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349809#2349810#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4497# bsam gtan dang po nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched pa'i bar du re re la yang zhi gnas rnam pa re re yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin rnam pa brgyad ston te / /
column9: 0.016#TD4029E.TXT.r#2163927#2163927#TD4029E.TXT.r_5726;TD4029E.TXT.r_5727# de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched  rdzogs par byas te / /
column10: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#197186#197187#TD4035E.TXT.r_12647;TD4035E.TXT.r_12648# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched thob pa'o // /
column11: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1378191#1378192#TD4037E.TXT.r_8224# rkyen 'di pa nyid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  khams rab tu dbye ba dang  dbugs dbyung ba dang  rngub pa dran pa dang  bsam gtan dang po nas rgyas par 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  byang chub sems dpa'i bsam  gtan dang  mngon par shes pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i bar du yid la byed pa na yang / /
column12: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1837348#1837350#TD4039E.TXT.r_2759;TD4039E.TXT.r_2760# nas ; / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyi phyir ni gsum pa'o // /
column13: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1843776#1843776#TD4039E.TXT.r_3483# de'i 'og tu 'phags pa'i lam gyi rnam pa mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa la brlan nas  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#1280917#1280917#TD4086E.TXT.r_174# sems can gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de / /
column15: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1484119#1484119#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9823# gzugs med pa bzhi pa ni sems can gzugs can ma yin pa dag la rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par  byas te gnas pa yod do // /
column16: 0.016#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641078#2641078#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13150# gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i    skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa ste / /
column17: 0.016#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2071127#2071127#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13472# mi mthun pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min  skye mched nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la'o // /
column18: 0.017#TD4068E.TXT.r#606609#606609#TD4068E.TXT.r_4121;TD4068E.TXT.r_4122# de ltar las kyi 'bras bu dang  gzugs la sogs pa'i yul myong zhing za bar byed pa ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched yin gyi de las     // / +gzhan pa'i bdag ces bya ba'i 'bras bu dang  yul za bar byed pa med do zhes khong du chud na za bar 'dzin pa las log par 'gyur te / /
column19: 0.017#TD4091E.TXT.r#704459#704459#TD4091E.TXT.r_1822# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyis pa nyid do // /
column20: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1868658#1868659#TD4039E.TXT.r_6231;TD4039E.TXT.r_6232# dge ba dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes mtha' yas dang  ci yang med pa yang de dang 'dra'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes cha phra ba'i phyir srid pa'i nang na zhi ba 'di dag ni mchog yin no snyam pas mos pa ni  mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column21: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324078#1324078#TD4037E.TXT.r_1181# chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'jig rten 'di dang  'jig rten pha rol dang  nyi ma dang  zla ba 'di gnyis dang  mthong ba dang   thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bcal ba dang  yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang  rjes su dpyad pa de dag thams cad la brten cing bsam gtan mi byed do // /
column22: 0.017#TD4033E.TXT.r#1388833#1388833#TD4033E.TXT.r_1078# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column23: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1453490#1453490#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6297# de na  ni gnyi ga med do zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched de na'o // /
column24: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1868588#1868588#TD4039E.TXT.r_6220;TD4039E.TXT.r_6221# ci yang med pa ni dngos po med pa tsam gyi phyir ro // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni srid pa bla na med pa / /
column25: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#827749#827750#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10162# de bzhin du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ma bskyed par 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du mi nus so // /
column26: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1817260#1817260#TD4039E.TXT.r_227# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur ba las ni rnam par grol ba'i gnas skabs su gdags te 'di ni skyo ba dang  'dod chags dang bral ba dang  rnam par grol ba rnams kyi rnam grangs gnyis pa'o // /
column27: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1785573#1785575#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10750# 'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i las bstan pa'o // /
column28: 0.018#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1910366#1910366#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam bsgoms nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams  dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so // /
column29: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1352867#1352867#TD4037E.TXT.r_4948;TD4037E.TXT.r_4950# 'du shes can nam / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar song ba'i sems can de dag  thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba mngon par 'grub bo // /
column30: 0.018#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2638978#2638978#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12896# bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnams ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs kyis spong ba nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa rnams ni 'du shes med  'du shes med min skye mched kyi nyer bsngogs kyis spong ba'i bar du'o // /
column31: 0.019#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1074776#1074776#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3699# 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de / /
column32: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2635956#2635956#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12496# de bas na de skad du yongs su 'dri bas brgal bas ni 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir    'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos pas de nyid bshad do // /
column33: 0.019#TD4095E.TXT.r#102411#102411#TD4095E.TXT.r_7689# 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bya'o // /
column34: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786569#786570#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3290# skye mched gnyis las zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi  skye mched gnyis las te / /
column35: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786586#786590#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3293# 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column36: 0.019#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1417010#1417011#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1933# sems can gzugs med pa la ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched  rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag kyang yod de / /
column37: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1599182#1599182#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_779# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so // /
column38: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1613532#1613532#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3244# sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs she  na ; /
column39: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#697755#697755#TD4091E.TXT.r_493# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched gnyis kyis so // /
column40: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1841458#1841458#TD4039E.TXT.r_3221# de bas na de ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa man chad las khyad par du thob tu zin kyang chos 'dul ba 'di las shin tu ring ste / /
column41: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#134597#134597#TD4035E.TXT.r_1673# 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang  bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang ldan pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa dang  zag pa med par bsdus pa'o // /
column42: 0.021#TD4067E.TXT.r#1089422#1089423#TD4067E.TXT.r_453# mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes ni tha snyad la mi mkhas pa dang  mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa'o // /
column43: 0.021#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1072043#1072044#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3223# de bzhin du rim gyis  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go // /
column44: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1768749#1768749#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8797# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi srid pa'i mtha' ni  'di tsam ste / /
column45: 0.021#TD4098E.TXT.r#1395207#1395207#TD4098E.TXT.r_844# 'du  shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba'i bar gyi grangs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column46: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393037#2393037#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9739# tshor ba btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i bar gyi rnam par  shes pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column47: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#30275#30275#TD4036E.TXT.r_4643# 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi sa 'og ma rnams kyi rags pa nyid dang  sa gong ma rnams kyi zhi ba nyid gang yin pa'o // /
column48: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1484132#1484132#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9825# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams lta bu'o // /
column49: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641093#2641093#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13151# 'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams lta bu'o // /
column50: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826257#826257#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9930;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9931# de yid la byed pa gang la sngon du 'gro ba yod pa de ni nges par 'byin pa'i 'du shes sngon du  btang ba'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba 'phen par byed pa'i las ni thams cad pas mchog yin pa'i phyir ram / /
column51: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1826557#1826558#TD4039E.TXT.r_1428# de dag de ltar spong ba'i 'dun pa la  brten pa rnam pa bzhis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  bsam gtan dang por skyes pa nas rim gyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du skyes pas sdug bsngal ba'i yang sdug bsngal ba las yang dag par 'das su zin kyang tha  ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams ni spong bar mi 'gyur te / /
column52: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707221#2707221#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_706# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du mngon par 'grub pa ni bla na med pa'i skye ba zhes bya'o // /
column53: 0.028#TD4041E.TXT.r#1269699#1269699#TD4041E.TXT.r_114;TD4041E.TXT.r_115# 'du  shes med pa'i lha rnams so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ni 'di lta ste / /
column54: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095229#3095229#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_464;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_465# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan / /
column55: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876986#1876986#TD4039E.TXT.r_7220;TD4039E.TXT.r_7221# de bas na shes pa snga ma ni brten pa yin la phyi ma ni rten du gyur bar blta bar bya'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni zag pa med pa'i lam med de / /

column3: grangs ji lta ba bzhin no // / +de dag ni chen po yang yin la 'byung bar 'gyur bas na 'byung ba chen po dag ste / / +nam mkha' ni 'byung ba chen po ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389881#389891#TD4044E.TXT.r_1484;TD4044E.TXT.r_1485;TD4044E.TXT.r_1486# 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i lhar skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rnam par dag pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389892#389903#TD4044E.TXT.r_1486;TD4044E.TXT.r_1487;TD4044E.TXT.r_1488# dge ba'i rtsa ba  thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa nyid du yang dag par byed pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste / /
column5: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1463907#1463907#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7457;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7458# zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang  rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o // / +zhes 'byung ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin na / /

column3: 'byung ba las gyur pa ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang  gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i phyogs gcig dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389904#389917#TD4044E.TXT.r_1488;TD4044E.TXT.r_1489;TD4044E.TXT.r_1490;TD4044E.TXT.r_1491# ma 'ongs pa na sgrib pa rnam pa gnyi ga yang mngon du 'brel par byed pas / /

column3: 'byung ba dag las 'byung bas na 'byung ba las  gyur pa ste 'byung ba la brten pa'i don gang yin ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389916#389928#TD4044E.TXT.r_1489;TD4044E.TXT.r_1490;TD4044E.TXT.r_1491;TD4044E.TXT.r_1492# rnam pa thams cad du rten yongs su gyur pa nyid 'di tsam ni rnam par smin pa'i  'bras bu'o // / +rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni / / +gzhan dag gi khyad par can gyi don gyi tshe rabs dgongs pa'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4013E.TXT.r#614702#614702#TD4013E.TXT.r_585;TD4013E.TXT.r_586# las dang  nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin rnams so / / +de la las ni byas shing bsags pas rtogs pa'i     // /

column8: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1020139#1020140#TD4054E.TXT.r_4861;TD4054E.TXT.r_4862# so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa dang   bsam gtan gyi sdom pas bsdus pa dang  zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa'o // / +so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i las gang / /
column9: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#630572#630572#TD4069E.TXT.r_1111;TD4069E.TXT.r_1112# mthun pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yin te mthun pa'o // / +byams pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las kyis zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i  lus dang ngag dang yid kyi lus kyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column10: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2465170#2465170#TD4019E.TXT.r_7650;TD4019E.TXT.r_7651# de dang mi mthun par mthong ba'o // / +bzlog pa ni don dam pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin la sogs par 'dzin pa'o // /
column11: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2030643#2030643#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7614;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7615# drug gtong ngo zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i rang bzhin rnams so // / +'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes su thob pas zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1926426#1926427#TD4032E.TXT.r_1062# mngon du'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang gzhan gyis yongs su dri bar bya ba'i skabs su bdag nyid kyis las byas pa'i rnam par smin pas yang srid par 'byin par mngon par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column13: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1946303#1946303#TD4032E.TXT.r_4095;TD4032E.TXT.r_4096# rgyu ni sa bon du bsdus pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba de yang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bag chags kyi  rjes su song ba 'bras bu ma byin pa kun 'byung ba'i bden par bsdus pa nyid de / / +'bras bu byin pa las rnam par dbye ba'i phyir / /
column14: 0.024#TD4049E.TXT.r#2294153#2294153#TD4049E.TXT.r_1252# byed pa po med pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel  par 'byung ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang  gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bur    mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1006013#1006013#TD4054E.TXT.r_2518# rkyen so so las kun du skye ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las 'byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang   gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig ma'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rkyen so so la kun du skye ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#155443#155443#TD4035E.TXT.r_5305;TD4035E.TXT.r_5306# las zad par 'gyur ba ni las gsum char yang spong ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / / +'jig rten las 'das pa'i zag pa med PA'I LAS GANG YIN PA'O // /
column17: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994380#1994381#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2260;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2261;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2262# zhes bya ba smos te / / +sa rnams sred pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir gyo ba yin no // /
column18: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2481813#2481813#TD4019E.TXT.r_9710# de 'dra ba'i dngos por kun brtags pas ji ltar na kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te / /
column19: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2481267#2481268#TD4019E.TXT.r_9637# reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba  dang  tshor ba'i rgyu la mngon par chags pa'i srid pa dang len pas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba 'grub pa'i las mthu dang ldan par byas pa'i srid pas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba la sogs pa 'grub pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba ste / /
column20: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904072#904073#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1805;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1806# nyon thos kyi rigs kyis ni bdag gi don tsam sgrub par zad kyi gzhan gyi don mi sgrub pas dge ba don chen po'i rgyu mi byed la byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis ni bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i don sgrub pas dge ba'i don chen po'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.028#TD4044E.TXT.r#383275#383275#TD4044E.TXT.r_321;TD4044E.TXT.r_322;TD4044E.TXT.r_323# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las / / +dang po'i rim par phye ba'o //// / +de las gzhan pa'i  yang dag pa'i smon lam rnams bsdus pa yin zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa de las gzhan pa'i yang dag pa'i smon lam bsdus pa'i phyir rten nyid du bstan to // /
column22: 0.028#TD4072E.TXT.r#2099081#2099081#TD4072E.TXT.r_953# de nyid kyi phyir gang du yang dag pa'i shes pas kyang stong pa nyid du bstan pa der kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin nyid byis pas gzung bar shes par bya ste / /
column23: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511147#511147#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column24: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108413#3108413#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2356# mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid  mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /

column3: de la mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten lta bu gzugs la lta ba'i bya ba can gzugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389927#389939#TD4044E.TXT.r_1491;TD4044E.TXT.r_1492;TD4044E.TXT.r_1493;TD4044E.TXT.r_1494# gzhan dag gi khyad par can gyi don gyi tshe rabs dgongs pa'o // / +rang bzhin smos pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i smon lam btab par de 'byung bar byed pa'i las byas pas byung ba ste / /
column5: 0.028#TD4033E.TXT.r#1382864#1382864#TD4033E.TXT.r_282;TD4033E.TXT.r_283# dri ma med pa rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba dang  rang bzhin rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba ni so sor rtog pa las byung ba yin no // / +yang na rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrubs  pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa zhes bya ba de dag la ltos pa'i rigs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa'i rgyu mtshan la brten te 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma las byung ba yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1259930#1259930#TD4051E.TXT.r_4026# rgyu dang 'phen pa dang goms pas las byung bas rab tu dbye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni  sbyor bas byung ba la sogs pa re re la yang rnam pa gsum du ston to // /

column3: 'dis ni rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams kyang so sor bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389938#389948#TD4044E.TXT.r_1493;TD4044E.TXT.r_1494;TD4044E.TXT.r_1495# 'di ni yang smon lam la sogs pa  med par 'byung ba'o // / +yun ring po la sogs par sdug bsngal la mi mjed pa ni ji srid du bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma bsgrub par te / /

column3: gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te kha dog gi bdag nyid dang   dbyibs kyi bdag nyid de / / +ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog ngan pa dang dbyibs ngan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389946#389960#TD4044E.TXT.r_1494;TD4044E.TXT.r_1495;TD4044E.TXT.r_1496;TD4044E.TXT.r_1497# yun ring po la sogs par sdug bsngal la mi mjed pa ni ji srid du bdag dang gzhan gyi don ma bsgrub par te / / +gang gi tshe gzhan gyi don yang dag par ba sgrub par gyur pa des dga' ba'am / /

column3: de la kha dog gi gzugs ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te / / +sngon po dang ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  sprin dang du ba dang  rdul dang  khug  rna dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389961#389974#TD4044E.TXT.r_1497;TD4044E.TXT.r_1498;TD4044E.TXT.r_1499;TD4044E.TXT.r_1500# yun ring  po la sogs par 'khor pa'i sdug bsngal las mi mjed pa'o // / +da ni 'di ltar yang sems can gyi don bsgrub pa'i zhes bya'o // /

column3: grib ma dang  nyi ma dang  snang ba dang mun pa'o // / +dbyibs ni rnam pa brgyad de ring po dang  thung ngu dang  lham pa dang  dkyil 'khor dang  phya le ba dang  phya le ba ma yin pa dang  sgang dang gshong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389973#389982#TD4044E.TXT.r_1499;TD4044E.TXT.r_1500;TD4044E.TXT.r_1501# sems can gyi don la dmigs nas brtsams pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa des dga' ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389982#389991#TD4044E.TXT.r_1500;TD4044E.TXT.r_1501;TD4044E.TXT.r_1502# bltam kha dang bltams pa las zhes bya ba la bltam kha dang     // / +bltams pa las gzhan mkhyen bzhin gang yin zhe na / /

column3: de la khug rna ni lho bur ro // / +snang ba ni zla ba dang skar ma dang me dang  sman dang nor bu rnams kyi 'od do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#389990#390000#TD4044E.TXT.r_1501;TD4044E.TXT.r_1502;TD4044E.TXT.r_1503# bltams pa las gzhan mkhyen bzhin gang yin zhe na / / +yang dag par mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang  bltam pa dang de ni rjes kyi byis pa'i gnas skabs na yang ngo // /
column5: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328018#1328018#TD4037E.TXT.r_1692# rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dgongs pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir so sor brtags nas sdug bsngal yun ring ba rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pas mi mjed pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don kho na'i phyir sems  can gyi don sgrub pa'i sdug bsngal bas dga' ba dang  dga' ldan du skyes nas tshe'i tshad ji srid par dga' ldan na gnas pa dang  dga' ldan du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gzhan rnams gnas gsum po lha'i tshe dang  lha'i mdog dang  lha'i grags pas zil gyis gnon pa dang  yum gyi  lhums su gshegs pa na snang ba chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par mdzad pa dang  yang dag par mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang  gnas pa dang  bltam kha dang  bstams pa dang  bltams ma thag tu yang sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun 'dor zhing tshig kyang  gsung ba dang  bltams pa na lha dang  klu dang  gnod sbyin dang  lha ma yin dang  nam mkha' lding dang  mi'am ci dang  lto 'phye chen po dang che ba dag gis lha'i me tog phreng dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  'dug pa dang  na bza' 'bul ba dang  gdugs dang  rgyal mtshan dang  ba dan la sogs     // /

column3: grib ma ni gang na gzugs dag snang ba'o // / +de las bzlog pa ni mun pa'o // / +lham pa ni gru bzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390001#390008#TD4044E.TXT.r_1502;TD4044E.TXT.r_1503;TD4044E.TXT.r_1504;TD4044E.TXT.r_1505# yang dag par mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang  bltam pa dang de ni rjes kyi byis pa'i gnas skabs na yang ngo // / +dam pa rab mchog ces smos pa ni / / +'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi khyad  par dang ldan pa'i rgyan no // /

column3: dkyil 'khor ni zlum po'o // / +phya le ba ni dbyibs mnyam pa'o // / +phya le ba ma yin ba ni dbyibs mi mnyam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390009#390017#TD4044E.TXT.r_1504;TD4044E.TXT.r_1505# 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi khyad  par dang ldan pa'i rgyan no // / +byas pa sbyangs pa ma mdzad pa'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas byas pa sbyangs pa ma mdzad pa ste / /

column3: lhag ma ni brda phrad par bla bsam  bshad do // / +rnam pa nyi shu po 'di dag mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  des drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390018#390028#TD4044E.TXT.r_1505;TD4044E.TXT.r_1506;TD4044E.TXT.r_1507;TD4044E.TXT.r_1508# byas pa sbyangs pa ma mdzad pa'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas byas pa sbyangs pa ma mdzad pa ste / / +sbyangs pa ma mdzad par bdag nyid kyis bya ba rnams la mkhas pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390029#390040#TD4044E.TXT.r_1507;TD4044E.TXT.r_1508;TD4044E.TXT.r_1509;TD4044E.TXT.r_1510# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las / / +mthu'i le'u rim par phye ba  ste lnga pa'o //// /
column6: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1330051#1330053#TD4037E.TXT.r_1967# byang chub sems dpa'i  sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las yongs su smin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o //// /
column7: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328531#1328534#TD4037E.TXT.r_1741;TD4037E.TXT.r_1742# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang  kun brjod pa dang  rjes  su bstan par gtogs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mthu gang yin pa de yang mngon par shes pa'i mthu rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang  sems kyi rnam grangs dang  zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthu rnams su ci rigs par 'dus pa kho nar rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i  gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las mthu'i le'u ste lnga pa'o //// /
column8: 0.028#TD4044E.TXT.r#390716#390716#TD4044E.TXT.r_1642;TD4044E.TXT.r_1643# de nyid kyis  'dir yang yongs su smin pa ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las rim par phye ba drug pa rdzogs so //// /

column3: sgra ni zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so // / +de la lus su gtogs pa rnams ni zin pa dag ste sems pa dang bcas pa'i  don gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390041#390048#TD4044E.TXT.r_1509;TD4044E.TXT.r_1510;TD4044E.TXT.r_1511;TD4044E.TXT.r_1512;TD4044E.TXT.r_1513;TD4044E.TXT.r_1514# yongs su smin par ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu drug ces bya ba'i don ni / / +yongs su smin pa ni ci / / +gang gis / /

column3: bzlog pa ni ma zin pa dag go // / +gang snga mas bskyed pa de ni zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390049#390056#TD4044E.TXT.r_1513;TD4044E.TXT.r_1514;TD4044E.TXT.r_1515;TD4044E.TXT.r_1516# ci zhig yongs su smin par 'gyur / / +gang gi gang zhig gis yongs su smin par byed / /
column5: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1539308#1539308#TD4061E.TXT.r_3585;TD4061E.TXT.r_3586;TD4061E.TXT.r_3587# 'di la su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur / / +des su yang nges par 'byin par mi byed de / / +gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang  gang gis mngon par rdzogs  par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yin pas khyod don med pas rnam par nyams so // /
column6: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3097067#3097067#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_759;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_760# zil gyis gnon pas ni rnam par zlog par byed do // / +shes bya rnam pa lngas zil gyis gnon pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin par  brjod par bya zhe na / /
column7: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1435872#1435872#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4168;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4169;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4170# gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan la 'jug par byed na 'thob par 'gyur ro // / +de ni med de / / +gang zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ni dbang  po rtul po yin la dbang po rtul po gang yin pa de yang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la dngos gzhi la 'jug par mi nus so // /
column8: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3089337#3089337#TD4018E.TXT.r_11061# de'i phyir de ltar rang gi sems gzugs su snang ba la mtshan nyid rnams kyi sra ba dang gsher  ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du de ltar mngon par chags PA'I 'BYUNG BA CHEN PO rnams la mngon par chags par mi byed de / /
column9: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1670915#1670915#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12201# 'o na ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa 'das pa rnams kyang 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir bya ba'am bya ba byed du thal bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#134025#134025#TD4035E.TXT.r_1562# de nyid la yang dag pa dang log pa dang gnyis ka las bzlog pa'i bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i  mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni sems pas rig par byed de / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +lag pa dang smra ba'i sgra'o // / +gang phyi mas bskyed pa de ni ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390057#390066#TD4044E.TXT.r_1515;TD4044E.TXT.r_1516;TD4044E.TXT.r_1517# yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur 'byung zhes  bya ba'o // / +de la yongs su nges par ci zhig yongs su smin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yongs su smin pa'am / /

column3: 'di lta ste rlung dang nags tshal dang 'bab chu'i    sgra ste ; / +sems can du ston pa dang  sems can du ston pa ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317350#1317352#TD4037E.TXT.r_166;TD4037E.TXT.r_167# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags ni 'di dag yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390067#390078#TD4044E.TXT.r_1516;TD4044E.TXT.r_1517;TD4044E.TXT.r_1518;TD4044E.TXT.r_1519;TD4044E.TXT.r_1520;TD4044E.TXT.r_1521# de la yongs su nges par ci zhig yongs su smin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yongs su smin pa'am / / +yongs su smin pa gang la brten nas 'jug snyam nas / /
column6: 0.008#TD4028E.TXT.r#1963424#1963426#TD4028E.TXT.r_74;TD4028E.TXT.r_75;TD4028E.TXT.r_76;TD4028E.TXT.r_77# gang la khyad par YOD PA MA YIN PA DE ni khyad par med pa zhes bya bas so // / +'di ni gzung ba'o // / +'di ni 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba'am / /
column7: 0.008#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2791332#2791333#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12542;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12543;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12544;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12545# 'di dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni ma mo 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'o zhes rab tu shes pa'o // /
column8: 0.008#TD4054E.TXT.r#1043484#1043486#TD4054E.TXT.r_8324;TD4054E.TXT.r_8325;TD4054E.TXT.r_8326# thugs brtse ba can nyan thos rnams la  dge sbyong dag 'di ni phan par 'gyur ba'o // / +'di ni bde bar 'gyur ba'o // / +'di ni phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'o zhes chos ston pa de la nyan thos de dag gus par nyan pa dang  rna pa gtod pa dang  kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa dang  chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgye  par mi 'gyur / /
column9: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2040994#2040998#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9115;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9116;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9117# dngos po'i byed pa po'o // / +dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column10: 0.014#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1452056#1452056#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6133;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6134# 'di ni zhi ba'o // / +'di ni gya nom pa'o snyam nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba yin no // /
column11: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502309#502309#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6955;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6956# bye brag phyed pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'o // / +thos pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di  ni yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad ma'o zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column12: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256200#256200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5237# 'di ni dang po'i yang  dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column13: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981344#1981345#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_368;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_369# dbyibs med kyang de'i bkod pa tha dad pas 'di ni phreng ba'o // / +'di ni 'khor lo'o zhes bya bar 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.016#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2026547#2026547#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7012;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7013# kun nas dkris pas bsdus pa dang  nyon mongs pa'i dri mas bsdus pa'o // / +de la 'di dag gis srid pa'i btson rar kun nas dkris pas na kun nas dkris pa dag yin pa'am / /
column15: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1005217#1005217#TD4054E.TXT.r_2394;TD4054E.TXT.r_2395# 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du  byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de la 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni / /
column16: 0.016#TD4087E.TXT.r#1576765#1576765#TD4087E.TXT.r_2618;TD4087E.TXT.r_2619;TD4087E.TXT.r_2620# 'di ni tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa'o // / +'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o // / +'di ni rnam par shes pa'i nub pa'o zhes skye ba dang  'jig pa mthong bas  rgyun du gnas pa dang  gzhan yang des dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdams pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa dang  dbang po'i sgo rnams ma bsdams pa kun du ma bsten cing ma bsgoms te mang du ma byas pa dang  de bzhin du zas kyi tshod rig pa dang  nam gyi cha stod dang   nam gyi cha smad mi nyal ba la brtson pa dang  zhi gnas bsgom pa la brtson pa dang  lhag mthong bsgom pa la brtson pa dang  des rigs pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa dang  rigs pa dang LDAN PA MA YIN PA YID la byed pa kun du ma  bsten cing ma bsgoms te mang du ma byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317044#1317044#TD4037E.TXT.r_122;TD4037E.TXT.r_123# de ltar 'di lta bu dag dang mthun pa 'di dag ni / / +byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536267#536268#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11302# 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // / +'di yod pas 'di 'byung zhes bya bas ni gyo ba med pa'i rkyen las 'byung ba'i don bstan pa yin te / /
column19: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790794#2790797#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12456;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12457;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12458;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12459# 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag ni de bzhin  gshegs pas gsungs pa'am / / +nyan thos kyis bshad pa'am / /
column20: 0.019#TD4053E.TXT.r#2989057#2989057#TD4053E.TXT.r_3299;TD4053E.TXT.r_3300# 'di gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang zhe na / /
column21: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032806#1032806#TD4054E.TXT.r_6857;TD4054E.TXT.r_6858# 'di gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /
column22: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#60506#60507#TD4036E.TXT.r_8932;TD4036E.TXT.r_8933;TD4036E.TXT.r_8934# phung po de dag la ni gang skye bar 'gyur ba'am / / +rga bar 'gyur ba'am / / +na bar 'gyur ba'am / /
column23: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081335#3081335#TD4018E.TXT.r_10082;TD4018E.TXT.r_10083# 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u  gsum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos dpyad pa'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos thor bu dpyad pa bcva lnga pa'o //// / +thams cad mkhyen pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por dgongs pa'i bsdu ba'i don ni 'di yin te / /
column24: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1331736#1331737#TD4037E.TXT.r_2198;TD4037E.TXT.r_2199# dmigs pa'i rkyen ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyus bsdus par rig par bya'o // / +de la rgyu bcu po 'di dag gis 'jig rten pa'i dngos po thams cad ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur / /
column25: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2705600#2705600#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_510;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_511;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_512# yongs su nyams pa ni gnyis po 'di dag  yin te ; / +spong ba'i yongs su nyams pa dang  gnas pa'i yongs su nyams pa'o // / +de la spong ba'i yongs su nyams pas ni so so'i skye bo kho na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro // /
column26: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1316836#1316836#TD4037E.TXT.r_86;TD4037E.TXT.r_87# sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags so // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin  pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags ni 'di yin te / /
column27: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1498982#1498982#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11472;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11473# yang na 'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'o // / +'di dag la de dag la sogs pa yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o // /
column28: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#127122#127122#TD4035E.TXT.r_388;TD4035E.TXT.r_389# da ltar 'dir dge ba byed pa ni mun khrod nas snang bar 'gro ba lta bur rig par bya'o // / +de la bye brag ni 'di yin te / /
column29: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117025#3117025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3638;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3639;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3640# byams pa de la mtshan ma phra mo ni 'di dag yin te / / +sems kyi  len pa'i mtshan ma'am / / +myong ba'i mtshan ma'am / /
column30: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776138#776138#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1548# de dag gang las rgyu yod pas na zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o // /
column31: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977609#977609#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11187;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11188# cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na lta ci smos zhes cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa skye zhing dge ba la yang 'jug par  'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +ma nges par dbye ba'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas su lung bstan par bshad pa dang  theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column32: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968329#968330#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10035;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10036# 'di yan chad du tshig gnyis kyis gang zag yod par rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por gang zag la bdag med par bstan to // /
column33: 0.023#TD4013E.TXT.r#613425#613425#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column34: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_840# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig  gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag kyang rig pa'i gnas lnga po nang gi rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  gso ba'i rig pa dang  'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa dag las brtsams te yongs su brtags pa yin par  rig par bya'o // /
column35: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1848092#1848092#TD4039E.TXT.r_3944;TD4039E.TXT.r_3945# de ltar kun du chags pa'i gnas de ni dbang du byas nas khyim na gnas pa  dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'dre bar gnas pa 'di ni log par sgrub pa dang po'o // / +yang srid par skye bar 'dod pa'i gang zag nyid kyi yang srid par skye bar 'dod pa'i dbang du byas te smon nas tshangs par spyad par spyod pa 'di ni log par bsgrub pa gnyis pa'o // /
column36: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2236050#2236050#TD4010E.TXT.r_707;TD4010E.TXT.r_708# chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no zhes bya bas mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o // / +mdo sde mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column37: 0.025#TD4098E.TXT.r#1394277#1394277#TD4098E.TXT.r_687# chen po'i chen po dang  chen po'i 'bring po dang  chen po'i chung ngu dang  'bring po'i chen po dang  'bring po'i 'bring po dang  'bring po'i chung ngu dang   chung ngu'i chen po dang  chung ngu'i 'bring po dang  chung ngu'i chung ngu'o // /
column38: 0.025#TD4045E.TXT.r#395325#395325#TD4045E.TXT.r_38;TD4045E.TXT.r_39# de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te / / +'khrig pa'i dngos po'i 'dod pa rnams dang  de ma yin pa'i dngos po'i 'dod pa  rnams te / /
column39: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3087960#3087961#TD4018E.TXT.r_10902;TD4018E.TXT.r_10903# zhes bya bar lan du mar bshad pa yin te / / +mnyam par  mi 'jog pa'i ma rig pas bdag dang bdag gir chags pas 'khor bar 'jug go // /
column40: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350608#1350608#TD4037E.TXT.r_4669# de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde gang las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am / /
column41: 0.026#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1657376#1657376#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_10037# gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i ma byin par len pa'o // /
column42: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#152866#152866#TD4035E.TXT.r_4885;TD4035E.TXT.r_4886;TD4035E.TXT.r_4887# rtsub por smra bas na chos ma  yin par smra ba'o // / +zhe sdang gi skabs smra bas na ma brtags par smra ba'o // / +chos log par ston pa'i dus na ma bsams shing legs par ma brtags par ston pas na ma brtags pa'i tshig smra ba yin no // /
column43: 0.026#TD4041E.TXT.r#1276378#1276378#TD4041E.TXT.r_1139;TD4041E.TXT.r_1140# dga' bar 'gyur ba ni da lta'i dus la brten nas te dga' ba'i yid bde ba'i gnas lta bur gyur pa'o // / +yang mthong ba'i chos la goms pas sred par byas pa ni byams pa'o // /
column44: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930568#2930568#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8691;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8692# de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi skabs su byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa dang  rnam pa dang  rang bzhin dang  khyad par la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i lam rdzogs par bshad do // / +de la bslab pa'i lam de dag la slob pa'i  byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan rnam pa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te / /
column45: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2048924#2048924#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10246;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10247# 'jig rten  pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i 'bras bu gnyis zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o // / +de la ni zhes rgyas par 'byung bas ni 'di skad du de dag ni zag pa med pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu spangs pa ches mang ba yin gyi / /
column46: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#685168#685168#TD4083E.TXT.r_145# spyod pa ni gang dus snga mar bya ba'i bdag yod par 'di nyid la gnas nas ci nas kyang 'di la ltung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'o // /
column47: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2566141#2566141#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3799;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3800# de dag kyang 'di dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya'o // / +'di dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya'o zhes bya bar yongs su gcad par  dka' bas so // /
column48: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#33551#33551#TD4036E.TXT.r_5127;TD4036E.TXT.r_5128# yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed cing rab tu 'dzin par byed pa'o // / +de la so sor brtag par 'os pa'i yid la byed pa ni / /

column3: 'di lta ste smra ba'i sgra ni sems can du ston pa'o // / +lhag ma ni sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390075#390086#TD4044E.TXT.r_1518;TD4044E.TXT.r_1519;TD4044E.TXT.r_1520;TD4044E.TXT.r_1521;TD4044E.TXT.r_1522# de la 'di yongs su smin par bya bas ni / / +yongs su smin pa'am / / +'di dag la yongs su smin par bya bas te / /

column3: gzhan yang sprul pa'i smra ba'i sgra ni sems can du ston pa'o // / +lhag ma ni sems can du ston pa ma  yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390087#390096#TD4044E.TXT.r_1522;TD4044E.TXT.r_1523;TD4044E.TXT.r_1524;TD4044E.TXT.r_1525# de la yang nges par ci zhig yongs su smin par bya ba yin pas yongs su smin par bya ba 'di dag ni yongs su smin pa'o // /
column5: 0.009#TD4047E.TXT.r#1228929#1228930#TD4047E.TXT.r_15300# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos bdag med par rab tu rtogs par bya ba la sbyar bar bya ba yin pas zhes byas nas de dag la gdams pa'i bya ba ni gzhan yin pas de'i phyir de dag gi khyad par rab tu bstan pa'i  phyir ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2511060#2511061#TD4019E.TXT.r_13695;TD4019E.TXT.r_13696# don dam pa ni dam pa rnams kyis don du gnyer zhing gtan la dbab par bya ba yin pas don ces bya la / / +mi slu bas na dam pa'o // /
column7: 0.027#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862927#2862927#TD4052E.TXT.r_2460;TD4052E.TXT.r_2461# yang rnam par byang ba'i skabs kyis bstan par  bya ba yin pas / / +ji ltar na 'jig rten pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jig rten pa'i rnam par byang ba ston to // /
column8: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1470464#1470464#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8212;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8213# yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po ni yongs su gzung bar  bya ba yin pas na yongs su gzung ba'o // / +tha mar bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i mjug nas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'byung ste / /
column9: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#859724#859724#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15170;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15171# 'gro ba rnams ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang par bya ba nyid yin la / / +bsgom pas spang bar  bya ba la yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang  phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te / /
column10: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1776132#1776132#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9641# chos gang dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos de dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes pa gang zhe na / /

column3: de yang yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro // / +rnam pa brgyad po de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang des drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390097#390112#TD4044E.TXT.r_1524;TD4044E.TXT.r_1525;TD4044E.TXT.r_1526;TD4044E.TXT.r_1527;TD4044E.TXT.r_1528# chung ngu la sogs pas so // / +'dis yongs su smin par byed pas na / / +thabs ni yongs su smin pa'o // /
column5: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096882#3096882#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_728;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_729# so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis so // / +de ji ltar so sor rig par byed pa de ltar ci'i phyir lan 'debs par  mi byed ce na / /

column3: dri ni rnam pa gsum ste dri zhim pa dang dri nga ba dang dri mnyam pa'o // / +dri zhim  pa ni dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po rgyas par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390113#390122#TD4044E.TXT.r_1528;TD4044E.TXT.r_1529;TD4044E.TXT.r_1530;TD4044E.TXT.r_1531# 'di ltar ji ltar shes snyam pas ni yongs su smin pa'i gang zag gi mtshan nyid do // /

column3: de las bzlog pa ni dri nga ba'o // / +gnyi ga las bzlog pa ni dri mnyam pa ste rnam pa gsum po 'di yang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang des drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390123#390138#TD4044E.TXT.r_1530;TD4044E.TXT.r_1531;TD4044E.TXT.r_1532# brtol la rag pa'o // / +de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs la rag pa  pa'i rgyud ni yongs su smin pa zhes brjod do // /

column3: ro ni mngar ba dang skyur ba dang  lan tsha dang kha  ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa drug ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390137#390146#TD4044E.TXT.r_1532# bum pa dang  rje'u dang  kham phor la sogs pa'i snod dang  aa mra dad pa na sa la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i 'os gnyis smos pas ni nye bar longs spyod pa'i 'os rten dang brten pa gnyis rab tu bstan pa'i don te / /

column3: drug po de dag kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang des drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390147#390156#TD4044E.TXT.r_1532;TD4044E.TXT.r_1533;TD4044E.TXT.r_1534;TD4044E.TXT.r_1535# bum pa dang  rje'u dang  kham phor la sogs pa'i snod dang  aa mra dad pa na sa la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i 'os gnyis smos pas ni nye bar longs spyod pa'i 'os rten dang brten pa gnyis rab tu bstan pa'i don te / /

column3: reg bya'i phyogs gcig ni rnam pa bdun te / / +'jam pa nyid dang  rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid dang yang ba nyid dang   grang ba dang bskres bkres pa dang skom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390155#390168#TD4044E.TXT.r_1533;TD4044E.TXT.r_1534;TD4044E.TXT.r_1535;TD4044E.TXT.r_1536# rten ni lus so // / +brten    pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos so // / +go rims ni dang por brtol ba yin la / /

column3: de la 'jam pa ni mnyen pa ste reg tu mi bzod pa'i don gang yin pa'o // / +rtsub pa ni rud rud po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390166#390178#TD4044E.TXT.r_1536;TD4044E.TXT.r_1537;TD4044E.TXT.r_1538;TD4044E.TXT.r_1539# phyi nas yongs su longs spyad pa zhes bya ba yongs su smin pa'i gang zag rigs la gnas pa dang  rigs la mi gnas pa'i bye brag gam / /

column3: lci ba ni gang gis srang gi mgo dma' bar 'gyur ba'o // / +yang ba ni de las bzlog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390179#390186#TD4044E.TXT.r_1538;TD4044E.TXT.r_1539# chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen  po'i khyad par ro // / +gang gang la yongs su smin par bya ba'i khyad par rnam pa drug gi bsdus pa'i don ni de dag yongs su smin pa ni yongs su smin pa ste / /

column3: grang ba ni gang gis nyan pas tsha ba 'dod pa'o // / +bkres  pa ni zas 'dod pa'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390187#390194#TD4044E.TXT.r_1539;TD4044E.TXT.r_1540;TD4044E.TXT.r_1541# gang gang la yongs su smin par bya ba'i khyad par rnam pa drug gi bsdus pa'i don ni de dag yongs su smin pa ni yongs su smin pa ste / /

column3: skom pa ni 'thung 'dod pa'i rgyu'o // / +rgyu la 'bras bu gdags par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390195#390202#TD4044E.TXT.r_1540;TD4044E.TXT.r_1541;TD4044E.TXT.r_1542# yongs su smin pa de'i khyad par gsum ni yongs su smin pa'o // / +de dag las gzhan pa'i go rims kyi khyad par gsum yang yongs su smin pa  ste ; /

column3: ji skad du sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o // / +'byung ba chen po 'dus pa me dang chu'i shas che na 'jam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390203#390215#TD4044E.TXT.r_1541;TD4044E.TXT.r_1542;TD4044E.TXT.r_1543;TD4044E.TXT.r_1544;TD4044E.TXT.r_1545;TD4044E.TXT.r_1546# de dag las gzhan pa'i go rims kyi khyad par gsum yang yongs su smin pa  ste ; / +chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i mtshan nyid do // /

column3: sa dang rlung gi shas chen rtsub pa'o // / +sa  dang chu'i shas chen lci ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328774#1328775#TD4037E.TXT.r_1781;TD4037E.TXT.r_1782# rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa chung ba de la gnas na de rang bzhin gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems mi 'jug cing / / +sgrib pa chung ba dang  rtog pa nyung ba dang  drang zhing mthun par 'dzin pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390216#390229#TD4044E.TXT.r_1545;TD4044E.TXT.r_1546;TD4044E.TXT.r_1547;TD4044E.TXT.r_1548# bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi le'ur bstan pa'o // / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems mi 'jug cing sgrib pa chung ba dang  rtog pa nyung ba dang zhes bya bas ni / /

column3: me dang rlung gi shas chen yang ba'o // / +chu dang rlung gi shas che na grang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4044E.TXT.r#390224#390233#TD4044E.TXT.r_1546;TD4044E.TXT.r_1547;TD4044E.TXT.r_1548# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems mi 'jug cing sgrib pa chung ba dang  rtog pa nyung ba dang zhes bya bas ni / / +las  dang nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs chung bar gyur pa nyid bstan to // /
